parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language type of the returned information:

- zh: Chinese
- en: English

parameters.name: ChargeType
parameters.description:
Billing method, including PREPAY (Subscription) and POSTPAY (Pay-As-You-Go).

This parameter is ignored for the Serverless edition.

parameters.name: ClusterSpecification
parameters.description:
Engine specifications, with the following values:

[Professional Edition] 

- `MSE_SC_2_4_60_c`: 2 cores, 4GB
- `MSE_SC_1_2_60_c`: 1 core, 2GB
- `MSE_SC_4_8_60_c`: 4 cores, 8GB
- `MSE_SC_8_16_60_c`: 8 cores, 16GB
- `MSE_SC_16_32_60_c`: 16 cores, 32GB

[Developer Edition] 

- `MSE_SC_1_2_60_c`: 1 core, 2GB
- `MSE_SC_2_4_60_c`: 2 cores, 4GB

[Serverless Edition]

Ignore this parameter, or you can fill in `MSE_SC_SERVERLESS`.

parameters.name: ClusterType
parameters.description: Cluster type, including ZooKeeper, Nacos-Ans.

parameters.name: ClusterVersion
parameters.description:
Cluster version, with the following values:

[Professional Edition] 

- `NACOS_2_0_0`: indicates Nacos 2.x.x version.
- `ZooKeeper_3_8_0`: indicates ZooKeeper 3.8.x version.

[Developer Edition] 

- `NACOS_2_0_0`: indicates Nacos 2.x version.
- `ZooKeeper_3_8_0`: indicates ZooKeeper 3.8.x version.

[Serverless Edition]

- `NACOS_2_0_0`: indicates Nacos 2.x version.
- `ZooKeeper_3_8_0`: indicates ZooKeeper 3.8.x version.

parameters.name: ConnectionType
parameters.description: Network access type, `slb` or `single_eni`; some regions' Developer Edition only support the `single_eni` type.

parameters.name: DiskType
parameters.description: No longer in use

parameters.name: EipEnabled
parameters.description: Valid when `ConnectionType` is `single_eni`, indicating whether to enable public network access (Elastic IP).

parameters.name: InstanceCount
parameters.description:
Number of instance nodes, with a range limit of 1 to 9.

[Professional Edition] 
- The number of instances must be 3 or more and must be an odd number.

[Developer Edition] 
- The number of instances can only be 1.

[Serverless Edition]

Ignore this parameter.

parameters.name: InstanceName
parameters.description: Custom instance name

parameters.name: MseVersion
parameters.description:
Required unless under special circumstances, with the following values:

- `mse_pro`: indicates Professional Edition.
- `mse_dev`: indicates Developer Edition.
- `mse_serverless`: indicates Serverless Edition.

parameters.name: NetType
parameters.description:
Network type, with the following values:
- `privatenet`: indicates a private network.
- `pubnet`: indicates a public network.

parameters.name: PrivateSlbSpecification
parameters.description: No longer in use

parameters.name: PubNetworkFlow
parameters.description:
Valid when `ConnectionType` is `slb`. 0 indicates no public network access SLB creation, and values above 1 indicate a fixed bandwidth for public network access SLB; unit: Mbps.

Value range: 0~5000.

parameters.name: PubSlbSpecification
parameters.description: No longer in use

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description:
The region where the cluster is located, including but not limited to the following regions:
- `cn-hangzhou`: Hangzhou
- `cn-beijing`: Beijing
- `cn-shanghai`: Shanghai
- `cn-zhangjiakou`: Zhangjiakou
- `cn-shenzhen`: Shenzhen

parameters.name: RequestPars
parameters.description: Extended request parameters, in JSON format.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: Resource group ID. For more details about the resource group, see [Basic Information of Resource Group](~~457230~~).

parameters.name: SecurityGroupType
parameters.description: Valid when `ConnectionType` is `single_eni`, indicating the security group type of the instance.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: List of tags to be added. Contains up to 20 items.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: Switch ID.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: VPC ID.
